body.name: Smart Bidet Toilets with AUTO Open&Close,Electric Toilet With Built-in Tank, Smart Toilet with Bidet Built In Features Dual Flush Design, Posterior Cleaning/Lady Care Wash

features: 【✅Purchase Notice】- Dear valued vustomer, the installtion manual can be downloaded in the follow "Product guides and documents", the attachment contain our contact method, and you can also contact us online in platform, thanks for your cooperation.

【✅ AUTO Open&Close】- The WITMYA Smart Toilet with bidet built in features a radar sensor system that automatically opens the lid as you approach the toilet about 5.9inch, providing a convenient and hands-free experience. The lid closes automatically when you leave the bidet seat, adding to the overall ease of use.

【✅ Heated Seat/Warm Air Dryer】- The Smart Toilet is equipped with an intelligent design that includes pre-heated bidet seat and warm air drying. You can adjust the temperature to your liking, ensuring a comfortable experience each time you use the toilet.

【✅ Built-in Water Tank】- Say goodbye to water pressure limitations with WITMYA smart toilet. It features a built-in water tank that saves space in your bathroom while ensuring normal flushing regardless of low or high water pressure. This also makes the bidet toilet suitable for any type of residential water presure setting.

【✅ Customized Hygiene Standard】- Experience customized hygiene with smart bidet toilet. It offers multiple cleaning modes, including posterior cleaning, soft lady care cleaning, oxygen-enriched cleaning and massage cleaning. These options keep your body comfortable and clean according to your preference.

【✅ Dual Flushing Design】- The WITMYA smart toilet features a dual flushing design to provide a healthy lifestyle. The built-in water tank supports daily flushing, while the filtered water is used for body cleaning. This ensures thorough cleaning and helps maintain hygiene.

【✅ Safety Guarantee】- The bidet toilet with IPX4 waterproof certified, ensuring safety and reliability even in wet environments. It also has power-off protect function, allowing the bidet toilet to flush normally all the times. You can have peace of mind knowing that your smart toilet is safe and efficient.

WITMYA WT-ST-GJ-01 • INTELLIGENT LIFESTYLE ELEGANT&DYNAMIC SMART TOILET Having a comfortable lifestyle from now on! We would like to let you know that WITMYA smart toilet with bidet built in will improve your life and experience features intelligent and multiple function. Bidet Toilet with Heated Seat, Electric Toilet Without Water Pressure Limited, AUTO Open&Close, Dual Flush Design, Posterior Cleaning, Wireless Remote Control. Perfect Gift for Families and Friends！ The Smart Toilet is a perfect gift for your lovers, aging parents, close friends or anyone who didn't get one. KEY SPECIFICATIONS AUTO Open&Close&Flushing Heated Bidet Seat Posterior Cleaning&Lady Care Wash Warm Air Drying Ring Wall Pre-wetting Foot Sensor Flushing&Remote Control Adjustable TEMP of Water&Seat&Wind Instant Running Warm Water

Without Water Pressure Limited Smart toilet with built-in water tank ensure flushing normally whatever low/high water pressure of residential, provides a powerfully and quickly flushing access. Off-seat Flushing The Bidet toilet euipped with off-seat flushing function, following by a powerful flushing on your departure for hands-free operation. Bubble Foam The Electric bidet toilet produce bubble foam automatically after seat at the toilet, efficently keep your health and air deodorization around bathroom.

Automatically Open Smart toilet features radar sensor system: the toilet lid automatically opens as you approach the toilet about 5.9inch, provides a hands-free experience. HD LCD Display Bidet Toilet with intelligent and practical design of HD LCD displays real-time temperature of seat and water. Waterproofed screen surface prevent moisture and humidity in bathroom. Multiple Cleaning Modes Smart toilet provides multiple cleaning mode optional: Posterior Cleaning, Lady Care Washing and Oxygen-enriched Cleaning, meeting the needs of different families.

Warm Air Drying Smart toilet with high-speed warm air drying let user bid farewell to the paper era, 4-gear adjustable wind TEMP: normal, 35℃, 45℃, 55℃, providing a hands-free and comfortable experience. Heated Bidet Seat Intelligent heated bidet toilet seat with 4-gear adjustable TEMP: normal, 34℃, 37℃, 40℃, providing maximum comfort and warmth for users. Instant Warm Water Supply Toilet with bidet built in features instant heating system heats up water without one minute, constant warm water supply depends on your needs while you use the bidet toilet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I loved it
reviews.reviewText: It’s a really good works great loves this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Reasonably good toilet seat; some issues conforming to the product page
reviews.reviewText: Overall this is a pretty good toilet seat. It wouldn't take much to make this a 5-star product. But the few issues I had with it were enough I couldn't give it better than 3 stars as it is.The first and IMO biggest problem is that they specifically advertise that it comes with "comprehensive" instructions; it came with no instructions. I didn't find it difficult to reason out how to install it, and I was able to confirm what to do using the instructions on the product page (though those were not what I'd call comprehensive). I'm sure anyone who has done this type of job themselves in the past can go straight to work on it. But if you advertise as "DIY friendly" and boast about your included instructions... then include the instructions.Also note, they say it fits most modern toilets and if you run through the pictures they show dimensions (identifying it as "O shaped"). It seems to be a little short for the standard round dimensions; it covers the bowl of the toilet I put it on and is perfectly functional, but you can tell looking at it that it could maybe stand to be 1/2" longer. (It did occur to me to wonder if my toilet was sized for an "elongated" seat; that is not the case, as that would be much too long.)The last issue is that twice during installation one of the plastic "feet" on the underside of the seat fell out. I was able to fit it back in and it seems the pressure-fit is enough to keep it in place; it probably just got rattled loose from all the moving around and driving screws and whatnot; I hope it will not continue being an issue now that installation is complete. (If it is, I'll update accordingly... and probably attempt a repair with glue.)All of that said... the mounting hardware seems reasonably sturdy (better than some I've seen). It's not necessarily the easiest type of mounting hardware to work with. (It uses a simple nut and bolt rather than a wing nut; getting the fasteners to engage can range from easy-on-the-first-try to frustrating-and-time-consuming; I had one go each way.)The seat itself has a sort of "quick release" mechanism from the hinges, which could be convenient for cleaning or if you need to replace just the seat (i.e. for some reason the hinges outlive the seat itself; though this assumes you can get another one like it). The seat and lid resist being "slammed" down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No Installation Instructions
reviews.reviewText: The product came with no installation instruction and I can not find any contact information to call for help. I have installed many toilets in my time with no issues but this one has no flange wholes to mount the unit to the floor so I am not sure how to install it. It also came with a battery pack, clear bottle and two values but again with no instructions I am not sure what to do with any of them.Very disappointed!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars REMOTE DOESN'T WORK.
reviews.reviewText: Toliet was setup without any issues. It appears to have potential. However, the remote is not programmed and/or just doesn't work. That's a bummer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The lid is heavy duty compared to the one my toilet came with. I can sit on this one and it installs sturdy enough that it doesn't move when you sit on the lid. It has a cushioning system that keeps it from slamming when closing the lid. The instructions are in Japanese but also on the Amazon site in case there's difficulty installing. Overall it's a great lid

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what i need
reviews.reviewText: This toilet has all of the functions i wanted
